title: Phaseblades
summaries: A Phaseblade is a pre-Hardmode broadsword. There are seven / six different color variations with identical statistics, with the color determined by the type of gem used to craft it. All Phaseblades emit a small amount of light when swung.
The Phasesaber is the Hardmode upgrade of the Phaseblade, being directly crafted from it.

statistics.Damage: 26 / 21 (Melee)
statistics.Use time: 18 (Very fast) / 25 (Fast)
statistics.Sell: 54
